Posts.Content: My mom’s whole personality changed on  tamoxifen she screamed and talked crazy stuff then went into like transes and more ! This how it is this drug has Gasoline in it and other property’s I looked it up I heard people wild story’s about people on this ! They minute it got out of her she became normal !
Posts.Title: I have a family member who just had a double mastectomy and hysterectomy because she has breast cancer (BRAC gene)
